text: Dow drops 840 points, S&P 500 heads for worst drop in 3 months on Trump tariff threat over Greenland: Live updates - CNBC

text: Billy Bob Thornton Opted for a 'More Humble' Prosthetic in “Landman” Scene After the 'Original' One 'Made Everyone Laugh' - Yahoo News UK
